posts.post_content:
Help!!  I need this T207 Hoff to complete a run of Yankees, it is the last card I need to have all the T205, T206, and T207 Yankees.

EDITED TO REFLECT THAT I PROBABLY WOULD TAKE ONE IN "3" CONDITON ALSO, I REALLY WANT THIS CARD!!!!  Or even a little better, if you have one you might want to move, let me know.

Looking for graded or raw, lessor condition like a "1" or "A", maybe a "2" if affordable.  

Thanks!

PM me if you have one for sale.
Note that I probably would take one in "3" CONDITON ALSO, I REALLY WANT THIS CARD!!!!  Or even a little better, if you have one you might want to move, let me know.
